heading: List of largest companies by revenue
body:
List of largest companies by revenue
revenue, according to the annually ranked Fortune Global 5oo published by Fortune magazine, as well as other sources.l Out of 5o largest companies 22 are American, 17 Asian and 11 European.[2]
This is limited to the largest 5o companies, all of which have annual revenues exceeding US$i3o billion. This list is incomplete, as not all Information in the list relates to the most recent fiscal year (mostly FY 2023 0r 2024).
